page.title: 04JOBS SURVEY DATA
page.content: The Survey of Occupations on page 3 was carried out by children listing the jobs of people living in their street. There are children in the class from all the streets in the village, and so, while the survey is representative it is not exhaustive as the children were unable to ident- ify all the occupations in their area. Some clarification of the survey is necessary. IN BOTH OUT indicates people who work exclusively within, in and out, or outside the village. BUILDING includes associated trades CARING includes those working in old peoples homes and hospitals, nursing. CLERICAL includes insurance, banking, estate agents and drawing offices. SCHOOL STAFF excludes teachers. ENGINEERING motor and electrical mechanics and the oil industry FACTORIES cement works food processing
